entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13 except 7 along the Strait.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 13 except 7 along the Strait. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
